question: What is the Cauchy-Riemann equation in Cartesian coordinates?
Which of these is a property of an analytic function?
options: It is differentiable only at isolated points.
It is differentiable at every point in its domain.
It has a discontinuity in its domain.
correct_answer: It is differentiable at every point in its domain.
